# emaxnls

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The **emaxnls** package provides tools for nonlinear least squares estimation for Emax regression models.

## Installation

You can install the development version of emaxnls from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("djnavarro/emaxnls")
```
